title: Servers down?
body: My friends and I can't connect to the server, i had a little lag during a game before and when it finished, it wouldn't let me reconnect to chat so i reset my client and now it says logging on... then can't connect to the server. Anyone else getting this?

replies.body: Was in ranked champion select and had a connection error, so I tried several times to log in but they all failed. I'm pretty sure the whole server crashed :(

> My friends and I can't connect to the server, i had a little lag during a game before and when it finished, it wouldn't let me reconnect to chat so i reset my client and now it says logging on... then can't connect to the server. Anyone else getting this?

I am having the same issue...Just finished work and wanted a game and a beer. Getting no  response from server. when I close down the program and restart I get onto the logging in part then it say unable to connect.... WTF? Telling me the server is online....sooooo???

Yes.

I too am unable to login.

Who's your ISP?
